name: ml-content-to-json
description: Fetch search result from ML and save to json format.
author: Hudson Van-Dal <vandal.hudson@gmail.com>

scripts.start: nodemon --watch src -e ts --exec "rimraf dist && tsc && npx kill-port 3333 && node dist/app.js "
scripts.start_old: rimraf dist && tsc && npx kill-port 3000 3001 3002 && serverless offline start
scripts.typeorm:generate: rimraf dist && tsc && npx typeorm-ts-node-esm migration:generate -d dist/db/data-source.js
scripts.typeorm:migrate: rimraf dist && tsc && npx typeorm-ts-node-esm migration:run -d dist/db/data-source.js
scripts.typeorm:revert: rimraf dist && tsc && npx typeorm-ts-node-esm migration:revert -d dist/db/data-source.js
scripts.typeorm:drop: rimraf dist && tsc && npx typeorm-ts-node-esm schema:drop -d dist/db/data-source.js
